SEARCH

Class StudentAccount

java.lang.Object
UserAccount
StudentAccount
public class StudentAccount extends UserAccount
StudentAccount is a subclass of UserAccount that stores StudentAccount objects. It contains methods to get points, add points, get camp committee, set camp committee, get camps registered, add camps, get camps, remove camps, and print profile.
Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentAccount

      public StudentAccount(String name, String userId, String password, String faculty, int points, String campCommOf, ArrayList<String> registered)
      Constructor for StudentAccount class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.
      userId - The user ID of the student.
      password - The password of the student.
      faculty - The faculty of the student.
      points - The number of points the student has.
      campCommOf - The name of the camp that student is the camp committee of.
      registered - Camp registered by the student.
